oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Rock House Holiness Church service, 2001 June 17

oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video recording of a service that includes opens with music and hymns led be several congregants. Congregants slain in the Spirit speak in tongues and handle serpents
